data.subject_search_title: TRAN8051 - Discourse Analysis for Auslan Interpreters

school.value: Faculty of Medicine, Health and Human Sciences

data.description: This unit builds on and applies the sign language linguistics theory from TRAN8054 to their own practice. Students will identify and analyse a range of discourse features from Auslan texts, including their own interpreting performance. They will be encouraged to consider how Auslan is used in different contexts of situation, and to further develop the language analysis skills needed in ongoing interpreting development.
data.search_title: TRAN8051 - Discourse Analysis for Auslan Interpreters
